General.Name: Sichuan Mingxing Electric Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Mingxing Electric Power Co., Ltd. engages in the production and supply of electricity and tap water in China. The company is also involved in the design and construction of electricity and tap water engineering; provision of hotel services; production and supply of natural gas; and development of mineral resources. Its energy services business offers power and water design and installation, intelligent operation and maintenance, electric vehicle charging, secondary water supply, and other business operations. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Suining, China.
